Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8

Hi all,

I created this thread for people to list works that might have some
connections to novelty search and behavioral diversity.

Some examples are the following:

Causal Entropic Forces:
http://dx.doi.org/10.1103/PhysRevLett.110.168702

Empowerment:
http://dx.doi.org/10.1109/CEC.2005.1554676

Predictive Information:
http://link.springer.com/article/10.1007%2Fs12064-011-0137-9

These books might have some connections:
Guided Self-Organization: Inception
http://link.springer.com/book/10.1007%2F978-3-642-53734-9

The Playful Machine
http://link.springer.com/book/10.1007%2F978-3-642-20253-7
which has links to homeokinesis and predictive information (see also:
http://robot.informatik.uni-leipzig.de/videos/)


Vassilis

--047d7b339347a56e4104f8a71d46
